story_arc: promise → course → data-staircase → pro/con → verdict → alternatives

primary_trope.name: tier_reveal
primary_trope.hook_text: 328 races. 14 dimensions. Where does MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic land?
primary_trope.mechanism: Countdown / ranking — inherent escalation and social comparison.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic scored 59 out of 100. Solid tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.text_on_screen: Should You Race MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic?

broll_sources.query: MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic gravel race

beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic. Beechworth, Victoria. 93 mi. Hilly to mountainous high country with significant climbing and technical descents.
beats.text_on_screen: MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic | Beechworth, Victoria | 93 mi

broll_sources.query: MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic route map
MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic course walkthrough

beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: Time to break down the scorecard. Length. 4 out of 5. Bring real food. Not just gels. Multiple distance options split at Chiltern, allowing mid-ride bailout from 115km to 90km route. Elevation. 4 out of 5. Your power-to-weight ratio matters here. The 2023 route delivered "1566m Vert, Max grade 9. Logistics. 3 out of 5. Adequate. The word was invented for this. Technicality. 3 out of 5. Requires line choice. Rewards the attentive rider. Joshua Tang describes "fast, loose gravel" on the first descent where he was "sliding around some of the bends while trying to find grip. Adventure. 3 out of 5. This race takes you somewhere different. Riders traverse "stunning private property in Byawatha" with "champagne gravel sections" and grassy breaks through farmland. Prestige. 3 out of 5. Respected. Not yet legendary. Race Quality. 3 out of 5. Good race quality. No major complaints. Experience. 3 out of 5. The experience justifies the entry fee. On-course entertainment includes "epic electric guitar performance and a heart thumping drum tunnel" plus DJ sets at hilltop locations.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: The rest, in rapid succession. Community. 3 out of 5. Genuine community feel. People stick around. Value. 3 out of 5. Fair value. You get what you pay for. Expenses. 3 out of 5. Plan for a few hundred all-in. Climate. 2 out of 5. Mild conditions. Nothing dramatic. Altitude. 2 out of 5. Mild elevation. Most riders won't notice. Field Depth. 2 out of 5. Modest field. Some fast riders in the mix.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.label: STRENGTHS
beats.narration: The case for MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic.
beats.visual: Strengths list overlay with positive visual treatment

broll_sources.query: MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic finish line
MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic race highlights

beats.editing_note: Warm energy. Each strength gets its own card. Avatar genuinely positive.

strengths: Challenging high country terrain with serious climbing
MAAP brand sponsorship adds quality and style
Historic Beechworth is a great event base

beats.label: WEAKNESSES
beats.visual: Weaknesses list with warning visual treatment
beats.editing_note: MIDPOINT RE-ENGAGEMENT. This is ~55% through. Open with burst sequence (quick cuts, warning sounds). Then deliver weaknesses honestly. Preview what's coming: 'Now, should you actually do this race?' [RIFF HERE] at the transition.

weaknesses: Challenging terrain may be too much for some

beats.label: LOGISTICS
beats.narration: Travel, lodging, and the unsexy details.

broll_sources.query: MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic race day

beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

logistics: Lodging: Beechworth has hotels, B&Bs, and vacation rentals. Historic town with tourism infrastructure. Book early during event weekend.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: High Country Challenge. If you're in Australia. yes, it's a well-organized event with excellent terrain. If you're international. probably not worth the travel unless you're combining with Australian tourism or other races.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic isn't quite right for you. For other Australian gravel: Gravel Grit, Dirty Detour. For similar high country terrain: Colorado or European gravel events.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
beats.engagement_question: Have you raced MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic? Did we get the score right? Drop it in the comments.
